mapper.insert: insert into student (id, stuno, name, stucode, stupwd, classid, sex, phone, photo, modifydate, modifyby, age, majorid, sheng, city, xian) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stupwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{majorid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xian,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update student
stuno = #{stuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stucode = #{stucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stupwd = #{stupwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classid = #{classid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifydate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyby = #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT},
age = #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT},
majorid = #{majorid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sheng = #{sheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xian = #{xian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update student set stuno = #{stuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stucode = #{stucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stupwd = #{stupwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classid = #{classid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifydate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyby = #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, age = #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT}, majorid = #{majorid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sheng = #{sheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xian = #{xian,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from student where stucode=#{stucode} and stupwd=#{stupwd}

select ,c.name classname, m.`name` majorname, t1.`area_name` shengname, t2.`area_name` cityname, t3.`area_name` xianname FROM student s LEFT JOIN class c ON s.classid=c.id JOIN major m ON s.`majorid`=m.`id` LEFT JOIN think_areas t1 ON s.`sheng`=t1.`area_id` LEFT JOIN think_areas t2 ON s.`city`=t2.`area_id` LEFT JOIN think_areas t3 ON s.`xian`=t3.`area_id` where s.id=#{id}
